name: Alfred B. CLARKE, et al., Appellants v. Caryl M. KLINE, now by substitution, Robert G. Scanlon, Secretary of Education, and the Executive Board, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: Alfred B. CLARKE, et al., Appellants v. Caryl M. KLINE, now by substitution, Robert G. Scanlon, Secretary of Education, and the Executive Board, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed, 64 Pa.Cmwlth. 385, 439 A.2d 1364.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: A. Bruce Bowden, Buchanan, Ingersoll, Rodewald, Kyle & Buerger, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Susan J. Forney, Dept, of Justice, Harrisburg, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
451 A.2d 443
Alfred B. CLARKE, et al., Appellants v. Caryl M. KLINE, now by substitution, Robert G. Scanlon, Secretary of Education, and the Executive Board, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 20, 1982.
Decided Oct. 29, 1982.
A. Bruce Bowden, Buchanan, Ingersoll, Rodewald, Kyle & Buerger, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Susan J. Forney, Dept, of Justice, Harrisburg, for appellees.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
